name: Winds Of Trade
description: Winds Of Trade is a strategy game about running an ocean trading company in the 18th and 19th centuries. Building your trading empire will not be your only goal! Ruthless pirates, shady smugglers, wartime and fierce competitors will make the way to the top a long and hard road for you!
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows Vista or 7 Processor: Intel® Core™2 Duo Memory: 2 GB RAM Graphics: 1 GB & AMD 5570 or nVidia 650 Storage: 1 GB available space
recommended_requirements: OS: Windows 7, 8 or 10 Processor: Intel® Core™ i5 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: 2GB & AMD 7970 or nVidia 770 or greater Storage: 2 GB available space
